description.value: If Szass Tam takes radiant damage, his regeneration doesn't function on his next turn.

Necrotic

Aura 5

Any living creature that enters or starts its turn in the aura takes 5 necrotic damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+35 vs Reflex; 3d6+10 necrotic damage, and Szass Tam gains 5 temporary hit points.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

+34 vs AC; 1d6+10 damage, and 10 ongoing necrotic damage (save ends).

Daily ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +35 vs Reflex; 5d10+11 necrotic damage. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter ✦ Fear, Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

Sustain Minor

+35 vs Fortitude; 3d6+11 necrotic damage, and the target is stunned (save ends). All allies of the target within line of sight take a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends). Szass Tam must make a new attack roll against the target when he sustains this effect. he can change the target as a standard action.

Daily

Minor, Daily

Ranged 10

Szass Tam or 1 ally within range gains resist 10 against one type of damage until the end of the encounter. Choose from acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder damage

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

Szass Tam spends a healing surge and heals 100 hit points. He gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of his next turn.
Szass Tam can convert any attack power he has to necrotic. Change a power's energy keyword to necrotic, or add necrotic energy to an attack power that doesn't normally deal energy damage.

Daily

Minor

Szass Tam gains two extra standard actions, which he cannot use to attack other creatures.

Encounter ✦ Illusion

Minor

Szass Tam uses the power contained in his robes to become invisible until the start of his next turn.

Recharge 5-6

Minor

Szass Tam regains the use of an expended encounter power.

When Szass Tam is reduced to 0 hit points, its body and possessions crumble into dust, but it is not destroyed. It reappears (along with its possessions) in 1d10 days within 1 square of its phylactery, unless the phylactery is also found and destroyed.

system.biography:
HP 388; Bloodied 194
Regeneration 10 (If Szass Tam takes radiant damage, his regeneration doesn"t function on his next turn.)
Resist 20 necrotic Immune disease, fear, poison 		Init +17 | AP 1 | Save +2 (+5 against charm effects)
AC 45Fort 45Ref 43Will 46
Speed 6, fly 8 (hover)
Ability ScoresStr 12 (+16)
Con 28 (+24)		Dex 14 (+17)
Int 32 (+26)		Wis 27 (+23)
Cha 30 (+25)
Languages Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Elven, Infernal, Mulhorandi
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +31, Dungeoneering +28, History +31, Nature +28, Stealth +22Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 33 | Insight 33

Equipment orb implement .
